solution_line_template: He pays an additional ${original_bill} x {increase_percent_decimal}= $<<{original_bill}*{increase_percent_decimal}={additional_cost}>>{additional_cost} on his monthly bill working from home.
Therefore, the total amount he pays for his monthly bill working from home is ${original_bill} + ${additional_cost}= $<<{original_bill}+{additional_cost}={total_monthly_bill}>>{total_monthly_bill}.
